
# ssn-nacl

Encrypt and Decrypt functions for **SSN**.

## Installation

Add the following to your `package.json`:

```json
{
	"sdk.nacl.ssn.digital": "git+https://ssn-nacl:4_yXuDEoZX-fxEjey1Rp@git.sabay.com/payment-network/sdk/sdk.nacl.ssn.digital#master",
}
```
### encrypt(PKCashier, SKService, message) : {string, string, json}
```javascript
var { encrypt } = require('sdk.nacl.ssn.digital');

// define keys
var SKService = "SBJ6I27D3TEYD5XGVB2OBVMSJDP3PIEXMSZYY7ZAYG4WPFQGXC5FCJOI"; // Secret Key Service
var PKCashier =  "GBJTZPKVINL5MNHYLJA7FYQ4PECRFS74AHFCKYVBI7NUCFQUERBN2Y7N"; // Public Key Cashier

// define message
var message = {
		network_address:  "GDTXTOPAMGXDSNHAOVLGPMSNHG3XIYTKZ5OUNVCP6J6XJI5AGMHSK3EP",
		public_key:  "GC3YDNXFW4SWTB6EPIS2473U5GH6BBIIE6GVP5MW6NVMPV5LMUACIQCM",
		details: {
			memo:  "sub:1112:1w",
			payment: {
				amount:  0.3,
				asset_code:  "USD"
			}
		}
	};
console.log(encrypt(PKCashier, SKService, message));
// Output: 
```

### decrypt(PKService, SKCashier, EncryptMessage) : {string, string, string}
```javascript
var { decrypt } = require('sdk.nacl.ssn.digital');

var PKService = "GBDUGGSX77F3RXSCTJM4HR5SGKP63XBRDKXB3QVOTM6LVDOHVEE2PEE2"; // Public Key Service
var SKCashier = "SBSLODC5NG44NTXJAVXB5IWJHGFTUL6YVE4O5U55YZG6654QMDEZUQRM"; // Secret Key Cashier

var EncryptMessage = "";

console.log(decrypt(PKService, SKCashier, EncryptMessage));

// Output: {
		network_address:  "GDTXTOPAMGXDSNHAOVLGPMSNHG3XIYTKZ5OUNVCP6J6XJI5AGMHSK3EP",
		public_key:  "GC3YDNXFW4SWTB6EPIS2473U5GH6BBIIE6GVP5MW6NVMPV5LMUACIQCM",
		details: {
			memo:  "sub:1112:1w",
			payment: {
				amount:  0.3,
				asset_code:  "USD"
			}
		}
	};
```
